meanings.sent1: The dank cellar felt cold and wet.
meanings.sent2: The basement was dank and musty.
meanings.sent3: The dank room made everyone shiver.
meanings.sent4: The dank air clung to our skin like a wet blanket.
meanings.sent5: The dank weather seeped into our bones.

meanings.sent1: The pizza was so dank, we ate it all in minutes.
meanings.sent2: The party was dank with music and laughter.

meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in dank hues.
